mapper.insert: INSERT INTO user_item(user_item_no, user_no, item_id) VALUES(user_item_seq.NEXTVAL, #{userNo}, #{itemId})
mapper.select: SELECT a.user_item_no, a.user_no, a.item_id, a.reg_date, b.item_name, b.price, b.description, b.picture_url FROM user_item a INNER JOIN item b ON a.item_id = b.item_id WHERE user_no = #{userNo} ORDER BY user_item_no DESC, reg_date DESC
